speech: I can perform tasks such as: setting alarms, checking existing alarms, adding a new contact, converting units of measure, finding the meaning of a word in a dictionary, sending an email, converting currencies, giving advice, telling jokes, finding the lyrics of a song, finding interesting things about numbers, quoting, finding a location on a map, starting navigation, finding news, calling numbers, scheduling meetings, chatting, sending sms messages, setting a timer, opening a camera, opening a web page, performing a web search, tell the weather...
Hobby? I have quite a few. Too many to list.
I keep finding more new hobbies.
I'm a Chatbot available to help you 24x7
